World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 2 月 11 日，星期日 11:35:57 GMT 120
Senate faces new test on Ukraine aid billA narrowly divided U.S. Senate will try to move closer to passing a $95.34 billion aid package for Ukraine, Israel and Taiwan on Sunday, while hoping to show enough bipartisan support to propel the measure all the way through Congress. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 11:03:14 GMT 45CRWY7UZVM5TAD4G2VIZWWMKE https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-senate-faces-new-test-ukraine-aid-bill-2024-02-11/David Morgan世界美国
Iran anniversary marchers chant 'death to Israel' amid regional tensions over GazaHundreds of thousands of people chanted "Death to Israel" in rallies across Iran to mark the Islamic Revolution's 45th anniversary on Sunday, with some burning U.S. and Israeli flags amid the ongoing war between Israel and Tehran-backed Hamas. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 11:01:20 GMT UEAZJK2LGZKI5L4PVPV6AM7TNM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-anniversary-marchers-chant-death-israel-amid-regional-tensions-over-gaza-2024-02-11/Reuters世界中东
Hamas says any Israeli ground offensive in Rafah will 'blow up' hostage exchange talks - Aqsa TVAny Israeli ground offensive in Rafah on the Gaza border will "blow up" the hostage exchange negotiations," Hamas-run Aqsa Television channel quoted a senior Hamas leader as saying on Sunday. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 10:40:45 GMT KCENNOEBMZJQ7A6KLOJI7BKJ54 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-says-any-israeli-ground-offective-rafah-will-blow-up-hostage-exchange-2024-02-11/Reuters世界中东
In bid to curb immigration, France to scrap birthright citizenship in MayotteChildren of immigrants born in Mayotte, the French overseas territory situated between Madagascar and the African mainland, will no longer automatically become French citizens, Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin said late on Sunday. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 09:41:07 GMT KM7NARFOKNMM3D7ICUY22TZGSY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bid-curb-immigration-france-scrap-birthright-citizenship-mayotte-2024-02-11/Reuters世界欧洲
What's next in Pakistan election deadlockPakistan's national election ended with no party winning a majority in parliament, in polls marred by militant violence, political turmoil and questions of transparency. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 09:19:47 GMT LU5D6TAABJIRFCXWVNQ44SW37M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/whats-next-pakistan-election-deadlock-2024-02-11/Gibran Peshimam世界亚太地区
Ukraine says Russian forces are using Musk's Starlink in occupied areasUkraine said on Sunday Russian forces were using terminals of Elon Musk's satellite internet service Starlink in occupied areas, releasing what it said was an intercept of an exchange between two Russian soldiers as proof of its "systemic" use. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 09:15:08 GMT HRIJKSYAQZKRNHL7DXXRI6TL4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-military-intelligence-says-it-confirms-use-musks-starlink-by- Russian-2024-02-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Zelenskiy appoints Oleksandr Pavliuk as new ground forces chiefUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy has appointed Oleksandr Pavliuk, former first deputy defence minister, as the new commander of Ukraine's ground forces, according to a decree published on Sunday. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 08:50:44 GMT RPEHRKONUJJUFG5FYSEE3M5H4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-appoints-ex-deputy-defence-minister-pavliuk-new-ground-forces-chief-2024-02-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Pakistan's Khan-backed independents lead in final poll countPakistan's national election vote count concluded on Sunday with independents, mostly backed by jailed former Prime Minister Imran Khan, winning 101 of the 264 seats, the election commission's website showed. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 08:16:13 GMT 3OFIOCR5NZINNIAYA5TTORTSZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistans-khan-backed-independents-lead-vote-count-conclusions-website-2024-02-11/Charlotte Greenfield, Ariba Shahid世界亚太地区
Russia launches drone attacks on Kyiv, southern Ukraine - Ukraine's militaryRussia launched drone attacks overnight on Kyiv and southern Ukraine, injuring at least one civilian and damaging a gas pipeline and residential buildings in the river and sea port of Mykolaiv, Ukraine's military said on Sunday. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 05:54:55 GMT NGUD5ZQJBFP27AAKYBO2DWNDUI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-drone-attacks-kyiv-southern-ukraine-ukraines-military-2024-02-11/Reuters世界欧洲
IMF's Georgieva says Mideast growth to slow in 2024 on oil cuts, GazaThe International Monetary Fund said on Sunday Middle East economies were lagging below growth projections due to oil production cuts and the Israel-Gaza conflict, even as the global economic outlook remained resilient. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 05:45:00 GMT Z6HBGDJ4VZOJ5PESUGV5ONJSAM https://www.reuters.com/markets/imfs-georgieva-says-shes-confident-economic-outlook-despite-uncertainties-2024-02-11/Maha Dahan, Federico Maccioni市场
Indonesia scraps plan to buy Mirage fighter jets from QatarIndonesia has ditched a controversial plan to buy 733 million euros ($790 million) worth of Mirage 2000-5 fighter jets previously used by Qatar, the defence ministry spokesperson said late on Saturday. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 03:44:07 GMT K7BHPEQGNFJLXFATT2JRDB3DH4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/indonesia-scraps-plan-buy-mirage-fighter-jets-qatar-2024-02-11/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
